title: i have 8 keys 2 key fragments and i dont have any chest
body:

replies.body:
In order to get a chest, you have two options: the first is buying them in the store for RP.

Assuming you can't or don't want to do that, your next option is to earn them: each season, you can earn one chest per champion (for a current max total of 136 chests a season). There are three requirements to earn a champion chest: own the champion, get an S with the champion, and have a chest available to earn (you can earn up to four in a week and your available number is checkable in client under your profile).

You can also earn chests by queueing up with friends: if they get a chest from playing in a queue with you, you'll get a chest too (assuming you haven't earned a chest for that champ and have one available).

The system is structured to incentivize diversifying your champion pool; it makes you play more champions and tells you to do well with them if you want the rewards.

And honey, I'm  sitting on twenty keys and six fragments, or so. Eight ain't nothing.

Hydra is pretty much spot on here! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

One little thing though, you don't actually have to get the S- or higher yourself to get a chest! As long as you own the champion you're playing, if **anyone in your premade** get's an S- or higher then everyone in that premade will get a chest as long as one is available for that champion ^_^! 

If my wording is a little confusing, you can always check all the details on hextech chests on our [**crafting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)!
